comment: My favourite watch face for my Huawei W1.

author: Chad Musson
comment: Excellent work!

author: Mitch B
comment: Looks great works well, I like the customization of shortcuts for apps.

author: David Richards
comment: What else do you need 🙂

author: Roy Dorsey
comment: Weather doesn't connect.

author: Sam Y.
comment: Looks great on my Zenwatch 3 & works well with my Google Pixel XL.  If you need miss your Casio or old Timex you should try this face watch.  Great customizable options.

author: Ernesto Velazquez
comment: I have an older version Moto 360 and this works amazingly with my Google pixel. It let's you customize the shortcuts on the watch face to tailor your needs. I'm very happy with it.

author: Michael Benjamin
comment: Awesome watch face

author: Colin Cheah
comment: I like that it is completely digital looking with no analogue artefacts. Some of the spacing of the interactive elements could do with better separation since long numbers run into the next field.

author: Shakya Mukhopadhyay
comment: Have been using this and loving it. Can you please add a solid black background option or an option for custom backgrounds (I mean the filler background, not the background of the watchface itself). I think a solid black background will save some battery on amoled devices... Would give full five stars if it had this feature.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. I'll add this request to my to-do list for a next update!

author: Larry Zimmerman
comment: This is a great watch face. You can customize it to just about anything you want. And  pretty good on battery life too. One question how do you reset step counter?

author: Jacob Baker
comment: Would be 5 stars if we could use weather without GPS.

author: Derek Hollier-Day
comment: The best... Keeps on getting better. Thanks Thema

author: Ed Hicks
comment: Nice, feature filled watch face.

author: Gabi Pavel
comment: I just bought it and installed it and i can't see or use it. WTF?

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. What is your watch device? Please send me an email to thema.apps@gmail.com I'll be happy to help you

author: Tony Bolton
comment: Very nice digital watch.

This is a complete, feature rich watch bidding you many options of customisation, information to be shown and a lot of detail. Design is lovely featuring the classic Casio look. It's fantastic!  I do miss some things in this watch, for example the options for cards not to be shown in ambient mode, not being able to change colour for the background and the personalisation of having your name on it, like the Octane watch face has, but that's me just being a nitpicker, haha. This is a really great watch face.
title: Retro

author: Andrew Shepherd
comment: This watch face does what it is supposed to do!
title: Pretty damn good

author: Jordan Vargas
comment: This interactive watch face really brings out the true power of having an Android Wear device.
title: Rich with features

author: Jochem G. Geerman
comment: Cool digital watch face

author: Dustin Butler
comment: Fantastic!

author: Sean Lechner
comment: Side buttons on a Moto are next to impossible to use and advertising themselves on a paid app is lame. Definitely not worth the money.
title: Pretty lame interface

author: Michael Kenny
comment: Simple design which emulates a classic casio watch. Perfect for someone who doesn't want a bunch of crazy and useless extras for their smartwatch, just something that functions as a tool. Very happy.
title: Excellent

author: Seth Province
comment: Love everything about the watch face but give us the option to take your advertisement the name of the watch face off in the settings. "Thema" and "Interactive" can go
title: Take off the title

author: King Antonius
comment: The weather window is stuck at 72° even when I manually update it.
title: No weather

author: Jim Mitchell
comment: Does not display Google fit walking activities

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Steps are related to Google Fit only. In settings on your MOBILE, did you approve the request to access the fitness data? Can you try install Google Fit app and see if it shows the steps count? You will need to activate history in it (like all google fit users do, on the first screen).

title: Asus zen

author: Ernesto Crame
comment: Nice watch face. I appreciate the dual time zone. No issues. Very impressed.
title: Well Made

author: James White
comment: Works perfectly everything functions on my Motorola 360
title: It works

author: Andrew Cordes
comment: Great face and plenty if options.
title: Great

author: Brandon Hilgeman
comment: Great watch face with many customizations

author: George Singer
comment: Great looking and nice functionality.

author: Rhett Williford
comment: Really like all the customization but the current temp is never correct.  I tried the other provider but no better.  I have tried other faces and those have been correct
title: Great face - weather never right

author: Jose Soto
comment: Awesome watch face. This really takes me back to my youth. I remember having watches similar to this in junior high school. Please keep up the good work. You have a great selection of watch faces.
title: Takes me back

author: Morry Zelcovitch
comment: Update... Your update helps... Many thanks:).....No mater where I press the interactions on the outer rim almost never register.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. Just to let you know that I released an update, with a slight modification of the shortcuts areas to get an easier access to the applications, and an option to display the interactive areas (in order to visualize where to touch the screen)

title: 4 border interactions do not register on moto 360 2nd.

author: Chua M T
comment: Not so nice for square watch,  wish they remove the side dark grey borders. That will be nicer
title: Ok

author: Gabriel Negrete
comment: It is visually appealing, has a lot of color options and has a lot of on-face shortcuts. AND it doesn't drain my battery!  Final grade: A+
title: It's perfect and FUNCTIONAL

author: Jose Brandao
comment: This is so far the best smart watch face I've used.  All essential and useful  functions can be configured to be used within the watch face. This is how a truly "smart watch" face should be. Highly recommended.
title: Best "smart face" I've found

author: Michael Schramm
comment: This is my new favorite. A lot of functionality and it doesn't drain the battery

author: Captain Carrot
comment: Looks good and works well. Really like the interactive panel choices.well done
title: Simply Good

author: Randy Moore
comment: Looks good and provides excellent options! Thanks!
title: Great watch face
